example.description: Easy way to organize your photos.
example.source:
<a:window buttons = "min" title = "Image organizer" icon = "folder_image.png" visible = "true" resizable = "true" width = "630" height = "400" minwidth = "450" minheight = "200" style = "position:relative;"> <a:toolbar height="25" align="top"> <a:bar style="border-bottom:0"> <a:button icon = "folder_picture.png" action = "add" target = "treeAlbums">Add album </a:button> </a:bar> </a:toolbar> <a:tree id = "treeAlbums" align = "left-splitter" model = "mdlAlbum" startcollapsed = "false"> <a:each match="[folder|picture|album]"> <a:icon match="[@icon]" /> <a:icon match="[folder]" value="icoDir.png" /> <a:icon match="[picture]" value="icoJPG.png" /> <a:caption match="[@name]" /> </a:each> <a:drag match="[picture]" /> <a:drop match = "[picture]" target = "[album|folder]" action = "tree-append" /> <a:actions> <!--a:add parent="[folder|album|../folder]"--> <a:add parent="[folder|album|..]"> <folder name="New album" /> </a:add> <a:rename /> <a:move /> </a:actions> </a:tree> <a:list id = "listPics" skin = "thumbnail_caption" model = "mdlPictures" align = "right" width = "70%" thumbsize = "{sldThumbs.value}"> <a:each match="[picture]"> <a:caption match="[@name]" /> <a:image match="[@src]" value="demo/images/slideshow_img/[@src]" /> </a:each> <a:drag match="[picture]" /> </a:list>
<a:table columns="80, 120" margin="5 10" align="bottom" height="30"> <a:label>Thumbnail size:</a:label> <a:slider id = "sldThumbs" min = "10" max = "200" value = "90" height = "8" margin = "5 0 0 0" /> </a:table> </a:window>
<a:model id="mdlAlbum"> <album> <folder name="Albums"> <folder name="Summer 2009"> <picture name="Beach" src="img5.jpg" /> </folder> </folder> </album> </a:model>
<a:model id="mdlPictures"> <pictures> <picture src="img13.jpg" name="Landscape"></picture> <picture src="img14.jpg" name="Flower"></picture> <picture src="img15.jpg" name="Trees"></picture> <picture src="img16.jpg" name="Sunflower"></picture> <picture src="img17.jpg" name="City"></picture> <picture src="img18.jpg" name="Meeting"></picture> <picture src="img19.jpg" name="Call center"></picture> <picture src="img21.jpg" name="The country"></picture> <picture src="img22.jpg" name="River"></picture> <picture src="img24.jpg" name="Wool"></picture> <picture src="img25.jpg" name="Fabric"></picture> <picture src="img26.jpg" name="Ocean"></picture> <picture src="img27.jpg" name="Beach"></picture> <picture src="img1.jpg" name="Phone"></picture> <picture src="img2.jpg" name="Lemon... ?"></picture> <picture src="img3.jpg" name="Mainboard"></picture> <picture src="img4.jpg" name="Sky"></picture> <picture src="img5.jpg" name="Beach"></picture> <picture src="img6.jpg" name="Cogwheel"></picture> <picture src="img7.jpg" name="Antenna"></picture> <picture src="img8.jpg" name="Beach"></picture> <picture src="img9.jpg" name="Cosmodrome"></picture> <picture src="img10.jpg" name="Outer space"></picture> <picture src="img11.jpg" name="Planet Earth"></picture> <picture src="img12.jpg" name="Hands"></picture> </pictures> </a:model>
